name: Format\Metadata
description: Information about your article, including author name, creation date, publication date, keywords, and excerpt.

properties.name: authors
properties.description: The authors of this article, who may or may not be shown in the byline component.

properties.name: campaignData
properties.description: A set of key-value pairs that can be leveraged to target your advertising campaigns to specific articles or groups of articles. See Targeting in the Advertising Guide for News Publishers.

properties.name: canonicalURL
properties.description: The canonical URL of a web version of this article. If this Apple News Format document corresponds to a web version of this article, set this property to the URL of the web article. This property can be used to point to one version of the article as well as to redirect devices that do not support News content.

properties.name: dateCreated
properties.description: The UTC date in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss±ZZ:ZZ) on which this article was created. This value may or may not be the same as datePublished.

properties.name: dateModified
properties.description: The UTC date in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss±ZZ:ZZ) on which this article was last modified after it was published.

properties.name: datePublished
properties.description: The UTC date in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss±ZZ:ZZ) on which this article was first published. This date is used in the feed. Include this date when posting older content to make sure the articles don’t appear at the top of your feed.

properties.name: excerpt
properties.description: Some text representing your article. Typically it matches the first portion of the article content. It can also be an article summary. Although this property is optional, it’s best to define it in all of your Apple News Format documents.

properties.name: generatorIdentifier
properties.description: A unique identifier for the generator used to create or provide this JSON document.

properties.name: generatorName
properties.description: The name of the generator or system that was used to create the JSON document.

properties.name: generatorVersion
properties.description: The version “number,” as a string, of the generator used to create the JSON document.

properties.name: keywords
properties.description: The keywords that describe this article. You can define up to 50 keywords.

properties.name: links
properties.description: An array of links to other articles in Apple News.

properties.name: thumbnailURL
properties.description: The URL of an image that can represent this article in a News feed view (channel, topic, or For You). For best results, provide a high-resolution image. The image is automatically scaled down to the correct size.

properties.name: transparentToolbar
properties.description: A boolean value that indicates whether this article should be shown with a transparent top toolbar that is overlaid on the the top portion of the article.

properties.name: videoURL
properties.description: The URL for the video that represents this article. A glyph appears on the thumbnail of the article tile, allowing the video to be playable from For You, topic, and channel feeds.
